comments.body: @johndmulhausen @bgrant0607 What's the process to copy these changes to the docs repo?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +76,80 @@# Create a service for an nginx deployment, which serves on port 80 and connects to the containers on port 8000.
kubectl expose deployment nginx --port=80 --target-port=8000
